# Here are a couple of links regarding VGA modes followed by a list of modes

## Links

[VGA timings 1](http://martin.hinner.info/vga/timing.html)

[VGA timings 2](http://tinyvga.com/vga-timing)

[VGA modes](https://www.mythtv.org/wiki/Modeline_Database#Dell) for different vendors

## Modes
